Quickstrike:








Quickstrike grunted silently at the news of Megatron's demise. "Knew that 
vermin was nothin' but bad news. Megatron didn't listen t' me." He shook his 
head. "What base? We ain't got no base, but Hell Beast's. We's just gotta 
wait 'til they run outta there wit' the computer an' all." He looked up. 
"Who gets t' lead now?" He squinted his crimson eyes. "Ah should. I'm uh 
veteran compared t' all of y'all. Ah know uh lot. So, ah say ah'm leader." 
He attempted to stand up. "An' ah don't want ya t' argue about. Ah know 
about this place." He held himself up holding onto a branch. "We need th' 
rest out here."
